column1: Use . to mean that it has to be filled by the FITS file writer and is not relevant to gen2. Fill in the blanks
column3: If it has a SHM name, we need to forward the "set" execution to old scexaostatus. RED: old scexaostatus will not take it
column7: Use this line and the "Comments" column ONLY for misc comments - the rest is automatically parsed.

column6: Size of frame grabber for the X axis (pixel)
Size of frame grabber for the Y axis (pixel)
Acquisition time of the frame measured by the framegrabber (us)
ID of the exposure this data was taken
column7: copy of FRAMEID with E as 4th character
